meta_description: Discover North Carolina's only museum dedicated to the study of global cultures. Open Tuesday to Saturday, 10:00am to 4:30pm.
hours_text:
## Nothing beats the real thing.

Wake Forest is consistently recognized as one of the most beautiful college campuses in the United States.

## The Campus Visit Experience

* * *

Come see for yourself why the Wake Forest campus, located in Winston-Salem, North Carolina, has been called one of the nation’s most beautiful by several sources.

Take a student-led tour or a self-guided tour to gain insight to the undergraduate experience and what being a Deacon is really like. A [virtual campus tour](https://admissions.wfu.edu/visit/tour/) is also available to enjoy from the comfort of wherever you are.

We look forward to sharing Wake Forest with you!

What your visit looks like 

Planning your visit 

### Schedule your visit!

Plan your visit and get ready to make yourself at home. Click the button below to get started.

[ Make Your Reservation Now ](https://apply.admissions.wfu.edu/portal/campustours)

* * *

## Here’s what your visit looks like.

**Student-led campus tours and information sessions have concluded for the fall semester. We are thrilled to announce that formal campus visits will resume starting Friday, February 13, 2026.**

In the meantime, we warmly encourage all prospective campus visitors to stop by the Porter Byrum Welcome Center, where we will happily provide self-guided tour books and campus maps, ensuring you have a wonderful and insightful experience exploring our beautiful campus on your own.

Student-led walking tours are led by a current WFU student ...
admission_text:
## Welcome to Wake Forest.

* * *

At Wake Forest University, we develop leaders of character, who inspire, support, and encourage others toward the flourishing of community. We call this  _Pro Humanitate_ , “for humanity,” our guiding philosophy.

## What’s Next?

» [Apply](https://admissions.wfu.edu/apply/)

» [Plan Your Visit](https://admissions.wfu.edu/visit/schedule-a-visit/)

» [Explore Majors](https://admissions.wfu.edu/academics/majors-minors/)

## For the Class of 2030

Information, deadlines, and other resources for those who intend to apply for the Fall 2026 semester.

» [Let’s Get Started](https://admissions.wfu.edu/become-a-deacon/classof/)

## This is a Remarkable Place.

Wake Forest University invites you to pursue the life of the mind with enthusiasm, build lifelong friendships, and connect your academic learning to the world through service, clubs, student government, athletics, civic engagement, field trips, study abroad, internships, and so much more. 

You will think better, analyze harder, integrate more, and communicate more effectively, which will separate you from your peers and propel you into leadership. And you will choose a major that thrills you while, at the same time, giving you expert knowledge and skills.

No other university better prepares you to live a life of such meaning and purpose. We are enthused by your being here to learn more about us.

* * *

**Want to be considered for the Class of 2030?** If you plan on applying for admission for...
collections_text:
Explore Global Cultures

Discover North Carolina’s only museum dedicated to the study of global cultures. Explore stories of humanity, from ancient archaeological sites to the celebrations and struggles of today. Learn about people from around the world through their everyday objects, ceremonial artifacts, and visual arts.

**Open Tuesday to Saturday, 10:00am to 4:30pm. Admission is free.**  
**[Find the Museum on the Wake Forest campus](https://lammuseum.wfu.edu/visit/directions/).**

## Featured Exhibits

**[Museum of World Cultures: Highlights from the UNC-Wilmington Collection](https://lammuseum.wfu.edu/exhibits/museum-of-world-cultures/)**  
Through February 14, 2026

**[Return to Sender? Aboriginal Cultural Heritage and Repatriation](https://lammuseum.wfu.edu/exhibits/return-to-sender/)**  
Through August 15, 2026

[ See All Exhibits ](https://lammuseum.wfu.edu/exhibits/current/)
